phrases.phrase: 당신과 기쁨도 슬픔도 함께 나누고 싶습니다.
meanings: 이성교제 I'd like to share both happiness and sadness with you.
실용회화-대화를 마칠 때 I'd like to talk with you privately.
실용회화-슬픔 We wish we could be with you in your sorrow.

vlive.korean: 이게 어떻게 하는 거였죠? 반반 나누고 시작하는 거였나? How do we play? Half and half? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 게임의 정석
vlive.english: How do we play? Half and half?

vlive.korean: 디다스 붙여야 돼 - 그럼 그렇게 말하는 지애 언니는 뭘 나누고 싶어요? What do you want to give JiAe? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] LOVELYZ X LieV - 러블리즈의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: What do you want to give JiAe?

vlive.korean: 맞아요 저희끼리 잡담 나누고 - 타이밍 놓쳐서 "빨리 들어가! 빨리 들어가!" Right, we chat together. - We lost track of time. "Go inside! Hurry up!" 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 도망갈까..! 🏃
vlive.english: Right, we chat together. - We lost track of time. "Go inside! Hurry up!"

vlive.korean: 어떻게 나눴더라? 규칙이 기억 안 나네 - 맨 처음에 반반씩 나누고 시작하는 건가요? How do we divide? I can't remember the rules. - Do we start with a half of the deck? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 게임의 정석
vlive.english: How do we divide? I can't remember the rules. - Do we start with a half of the deck?

vlive.korean: 이 얘기부터 나누고 싶었어요. I'd like to say this first. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] Jeong sewoon X LieV - 정세운의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: I'd like to say this first.

examples.korean: A bead curtain separated the two rooms. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 구슬 커튼이 그 두 방을 나누고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A bead curtain separated the two rooms. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: After dinner, we sat talking on the veranda. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 저녁을 먹은 후 우리는 베란다에 앉아 이야기를 나누고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: After dinner, we sat talking on the veranda. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They exchanged greetings and sat down to lunch. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 인사를 나누고 점심 식사를 하기 위해 자리에 앉았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They exchanged greetings and sat down to lunch. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They were sharing a private joke. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 사사로운 농담을 나누고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They were sharing a private joke. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They exchanged hellos and forced smiles. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 인사를 나누고 억지로 미소를 지었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They exchanged hellos and forced smiles. Add to Wordbook
